SCTX:
Begin WolfenderInnocent 

short OnPCHitme
short doonce

if (doonce==1)
	return
endif

modFatigue -250

if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_Wolfgiver" >= 80 )
		 Enable
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex "BM_Wolfgiver" < 80 )
		 Disable
endif


if ( OnPCHitMe == 1 )
	modFatigue 0
	modHealth 0
endif

if ( OnDeath == 1 )
	additem "ingred_innocent_heart" 1
endif

if ( GetItemCount "ingred_wolf_heart" >= 1 )
	If (doonce==0)
		Journal BM_WolfGiver 105
		Set doonce to 1
	endif
endif

End WolfenderInnocent
